articles.title: Salesforce investors hope for faster growth, AI progress in earnings
articles.summary: Investors want to see Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence tool for customer service pick up traction.
articles.translated_title: Salesforce investors hope for faster growth, AI progress in earnings
articles.translated_summary: Investors want to see Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence tool for customer service pick up traction.

articles.title: Anthropic valued at $183 billion after $13 billion fundraise
articles.summary: Artificial-intelligence company Anthropic said on Tuesday it had raised $13 billion at a $183 billion post-money valuation led by investment firm ICONIQ.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic valued at $183 billion after $13 billion fundraise
articles.translated_summary: Artificial-intelligence company Anthropic said on Tuesday it had raised $13 billion at a $183 billion post-money valuation led by investment firm ICONIQ.

articles.title: Anthropic Completes New Funding Round at $183 Billion Valuation
articles.summary: Anthropic has closed a deal to raise $13 billion from investors in a new funding round that nearly triples its valuation to $183 billion, including dollars raised — a larger-than-expected haul that makes the artificial intelligence company one of the most valuable startups in the world.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic Completes New Funding Round at $183 Billion Valuation
articles.translated_summary: Anthropic has closed a deal to raise $13 billion from investors in a new funding round that nearly triples its valuation to $183 billion, including dollars raised — a larger-than-expected haul that makes the artificial intelligence company one of the most valuable startups in the world.

articles.title: OpenAI and Meta say they’re fixing AI chatbots to better respond to teens in distress
articles.summary: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Artificial intelligence chatbot makers OpenAI and Meta say they are adjusting how their chatbots respond to teenagers and other users…
articles.translated_title: OpenAI and Meta say they’re fixing AI chatbots to better respond to teens in distress
articles.translated_summary: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Artificial intelligence chatbot makers OpenAI and Meta say they are adjusting how their chatbots respond to teenagers and other users…

articles.title: OpenAI and Meta Say They're Fixing AI Chatbots to Better Respond to Teens in Distress
articles.summary: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Artificial intelligence chatbot makers OpenAI and Meta say they are adjusting how their chatbots respond to teenagers and other users asking questions about suicide or showing signs of mental and emotional distress.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI and Meta Say They're Fixing AI Chatbots to Better Respond to Teens in Distress
articles.translated_summary: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Artificial intelligence chatbot makers OpenAI and Meta say they are adjusting how their chatbots respond to teenagers and other users asking questions about suicide or showing signs of mental and emotional distress.

articles.title: US manufacturing mired in weakness; AI spending boom helps some factories
articles.summary: U.S. manufacturing contracted for a sixth straight month in August as factories continued to grapple with the impact of import tariffs, but an artificial intelligence spending boom is lending support to some segments of the industry.
articles.translated_title: US manufacturing mired in weakness; AI spending boom helps some factories
articles.translated_summary: U.S. manufacturing contracted for a sixth straight month in August as factories continued to grapple with the impact of import tariffs, but an artificial intelligence spending boom is lending support to some segments of the industry.

articles.title: To scale AI and bring Zero Trust security, look to the chips
articles.summary: Improved artificial intelligence and security is just a matter of taking advantage of chips already built into defense systems.
articles.translated_title: To scale AI and bring Zero Trust security, look to the chips
articles.translated_summary: Improved artificial intelligence and security is just a matter of taking advantage of chips already built into defense systems.

articles.title: AI Start-ups Are Rolling in Cash
articles.summary: Investors are plowing record sums of money into artificial intelligence start-ups. Even as sales grow swiftly, losses are piling up for AI firms.
articles.translated_title: AI Start-ups Are Rolling in Cash
articles.translated_summary: Investors are plowing record sums of money into artificial intelligence start-ups. Even as sales grow swiftly, losses are piling up for AI firms.

articles.title: Goldman Sachs’s Minnis Sees M&A Ramp-Up, AI Spending Boom
articles.summary: Mergers and acquisitions are likely to pick up toward the end of the year and the artificial intelligence boom will drive significant infrastructure financing, according to Goldman Sachs’s global head of credit finance.
articles.translated_title: Goldman Sachs’s Minnis Sees M&A Ramp-Up, AI Spending Boom
articles.translated_summary: Mergers and acquisitions are likely to pick up toward the end of the year and the artificial intelligence boom will drive significant infrastructure financing, according to Goldman Sachs’s global head of credit finance.

articles.title: Donald Trump Wants to Cut Government Research Grants
articles.summary: The upcoming budget bill could put grants that fund life-saving drugs like GLP-1 and innovations such as artificial intelligence in jeopardy.
articles.translated_title: Donald Trump Wants to Cut Government Research Grants
articles.translated_summary: The upcoming budget bill could put grants that fund life-saving drugs like GLP-1 and innovations such as artificial intelligence in jeopardy.
